athena:
Single muon 100 GeV, run2 chains MuonSlice-single muon larged0, pu0, run2 chains EventMax=5000;runMergedChain=True TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_MuonSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long # include "samples/TrigInDetValidation_mu_sample7.xml"
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt-larged0.dat -f data-muon.root -p 13 -b Test_bin.dat
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-muon.root data-mu_single_mu_larged0-reference.root HLT_mu6_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_FTF HLT_mu6_L2Star_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_EFID HLT_mu6_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_IDTrig -d HLTEF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-muon.root data-mu_single_mu_larged0-reference.root HLT_mu6_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Muon_FTF HLT_mu6_L2Star_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Muon_0 HLT_mu6_L2Star_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Muon_1 HLT_mu6_L2Star_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Muon_2 -d HLTL2-plots
# include "TrigInDetValidation_expertMonitoring.xml" # include "TrigInDetValidation_costMonitoring.xml" # include "TrigInDetValidation_extra.xml"
RTT:Top CheckFileRunner0
data-mu_single_mu_larged0-reference.root expert-monitoring-mu_single_mu_larged0-ref.root # include "TrigInDetValidation_aux.xml"
